title: gryeer 8 Pack Microfibre Tea Towels, Super Absorbent, Soft and Lint Free Kitchen Towels, 45 x 65 cm, Grey
features: SUPER ABSORBENT - Unlike some towels just push water around, microfibre tea towels are very absorbent and they absorb liquid quickly with just a slight wipe. They dry fast by just hanging up there.

SOFT & LINT FREE - The kitchen towels are very soft and quick drying, they won’t scratch or leave lint on your devices, safe and clean. Each towel has a loop enables you to hang them anywhere in convenience.
DURABLE - Made of 80% polyester and 20% polyamide, These dish towels are much more durable than common cotton towels, they don't easily fall apart or shrink even after years of use.

VALUE PACK - Measuring 45 x 65 cm with 8 towels inside, this classic check designed tea towels are large and thick enough to handle all kinds of kitchen cleaning work, they are available in grey, blue, green, and khaki colours.

SPECIAL TIPS - Machine washable and dry-able. Recommend to wash in plain water before first use. Do not use these towels on high temperature surfaces such as ovens and stoves to avoid damaging or burning holes on the towel.
description: Product Description Highly Absorbent Kitchen towels are essential to every home and kitchen. Unlike traditional cotton towels just pushing water around, microfiber towels absorb liquids like a sponge and dry quickly, no color bleeding and no lint leaves behind. The towels remain highly absorbent and soft after multiple wash and dry cycles. Super Soft Fluffy and soft, no kitchen appliances will be scratched under these tea towels. The thick microfiber is built to soak up considerable amounts of liquid, so you no longer have to wipe and wring towels repeatedly. Multi colour choices There are 4 color choices of these kitchen towels, which is not only for decorating your home and kitchen accordingly, but also to distinguish the purposes for dishes, windows, desks, floors, etc. You can also use the towels to wipe off the water from fruit and produce after washing them. Each towel has a loop enables you to hang them anywhere in convenience or just fold them in the cabinet, easy and convenient. Durable and built to last With quality in every thread, these durable, long lasting microfiber kitchen towels are a must with unique design that will make your home clean and lovely. Professionally hemmed edges are carefully crafted to enhance towels’ quality and durability, they won’t fall apart or shrink like cotton towels. Ultra versatile These microfiber dish towels are larger than normal kitchen towels, very suitable for any family with much drying work to do everyday. Thick and heavy duty material, perfect for cleanups in kitchen, camping trips, cars, and household use. They keep your home tidy and your messes at bay. Care Instructions Always wash new towels before use. Do not use fabric softener or bleach on these towels. Machine wash cold separately. To ensure the long life of towels, wash them on a very gentle cycle in cold water before drying them on low setting in a tumbler. These towels can not be used as oven mitts to hold hot pots and pans. Do not use these towels on high temperature surfaces such as ovens and stoves to avoid damaging or burning holes on the towel.
